name: GDKO Round 2: Balloonhead
description:
⚠️ (Game might take a moment to load)

MADE FOR GDKO Round 2!

Move with WASD or Arrow Keys

Toggle between rolling and floating with Spacebar

Collect balloons to increase your multiplier and refill your air meter!

🔉 (Play with sound)

New toy is the balloons that allow you to float longer! Collect as many as you can to increase your multiplier and get the highest score! Post your best score in the comments :)
